text: My otpravili Svoikh poslannikov, kotorykh My izbrali, s veskimi dovodami i yavnymi chudesami i nisposlali s nimi Pisaniya, soderzhashchiye ustanovleniya i zakony religii, i vesy, kotoryye ustanavlivayut spravedlivost' v otnosheniyakh mezhdu lyud'mi, chtoby lyudi priderzhivalis' spravedlivosti, sotrudnichaya drug s drugom. I My sozdali zhelezo, prichinyayushcheye lyudyam strashnyye muki vo vremya voyny i prinosyashcheye im pol'zu v mirnoye vremya. Ved' lyudi ispol'zuyut yego v remoslakh v svoikh interesakh i na pol'zu v svoyey zhizni. Vso eto - dlya togo, chtoby Allakh vyyavil, kto pomogayet Yego religii i podderzhivayet Yego poslannikov. Poistine, Sam Allakh Vsemogushch i ne nuzhdayetsya ni v ch'yey pomoshchi
